name: Robotagami (Battle Worn Copper Edition)
description:
I was inspired to create a design of my robots out of a single sheet of steel and Robotagami was started. I will have several editions later on. They stand about 8 1/2 inches tall and can pose on your desk, even hold business cards. Pose them how you want.

Thanks to Philip Reed of www.battlegrip.com for taking some pictures of his Robotagami on location.

Right now I have a steel and battle worn copper version.

THIS LISTING IS FOR THE COPPER VERSION.

name: Robotagami Mini (Stainless Edition)
description:
Robotagami - Foldable, poseable, robotic figure cut from a flat sheet of metal then bent like Origami to become a collectible piece of artwork. Robotagami are designed to be art that anyone can collect much like sophisticated action figures for the kid in us all.

This listing is for the Robotagami Mini. They stand just over 4 inches tall and are half the size of the regular Robotagami. They are much smaller so you can collect them and put them anywhere you want to display them.
